issue.title: [Python] Add StreamReader/FileReader methods that read all record batches as a Table
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-515](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-515). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In situations where the goal is to obtain a `pyarrow.Table` containing multiple batches, this will avoid some Python object boxing and unboxing overhead (especially when there are many small record batches).
